header.title: wxDisplayChangedEvent

description.p: A display changed event is sent to top-level windows when the display resolution has changed.
This event is currently emitted under Windows only.
This class is derived (and can use functions) from: wxEvent

section.title: Events
section.p: Use wxEvtHandler:connect/3 with wxDisplayChangedEventType to subscribe to events of this type.
